page.title: 20B2116 Traffic Count
page.content: I went in a car to the B2116 road with Mrs Taylor and Sally Courcha on Wednesday 3rd of July.This is a small country road off the main Lewes to Chaily road.It runs along the bottom of the steep slope that leads up to the top of the Downs.We went to count the traffic using the road from 10:00am for an hour,until 11:00am. During that hour there were 92 cars, 3 bikes,0 buses,1 motorbikes, 5 lorries,11 vans and 1 tractor going towards Lewes.There were also 78 cars,10 lorries, 4 motor bikes,16 vans, 3 bikes,0 buses and 1 tractor coming from Lewes. We thought it was a quiet country road,but we discovered that it was quite busy.Altogether 225 vehicles travelled along the road during the hour we were taking our count.
